panels.description:
container_network_receive_bytes_total cumulative bytes received excluding eth0
See https://github.com/google/cadvisor/issues/2615

targets.expr:
sum by(node) (
    sum by(pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", interface!="eth0"}[$__rate_interval]))
     + on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod, node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
)

sum by (node) (
sum by(pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", interface!="eth0"}[$__rate_interval]))
+ on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
  )

panels.title: Pod network bandwidth

panels.description:
container_network_receive_bytes_total cumulative bytes received excluding eth0
See https://github.com/google/cadvisor/issues/2615

targets.expr:
sum by(node,interface) (
    sum by(pod,interface) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
     + on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod, node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
)
targets.legendFormat: receive by pod on node={{node}} on if={{interface}}

targets.expr:
sum by (node,interface) (
   sum by(pod,interface) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
    + on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
)
targets.legendFormat: transmit by pod on node={{node}} on if={{interface}}

panels.title: Pod network bandwidth
Kine Pod bandwidth per node and interface

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (count_over_time({namespace=~"$namespace"} |= "$query" |~ "$query_regexp" [$__interval]) )

sum by (node) (
sum by(pod) (count_over_time({namespace=~"$namespace"} |= "$query" |~ "$query_regexp" [$__interval]))    
+ on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
)

panels.description: Logs from services running in Kubernetes

targets.expr: {namespace=~"$namespace"} |= "$query"
{namespace=~"$namespace"} |= "$query" |~ "$query_regexp"

panels.description: The number of connections currently in use.

targets.expr:
sum by (node) (
   sum by(pod) (go_sql_in_use_connections ) 
   + on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="94-shared-services-kine"})
)

sum by (node) (
   sum by(pod) (go_sql_max_open_connections  ) 
   + on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="94-shared-services-kine"})
)
targets.legendFormat: max nb cnx for pod {{pod}} on node {{node}}

panels.title: kine

panels.description: The number of connections currently in use.

targets.expr:
sum by (node) (
   sum by(pod) (go_sql_in_use_connections ) 
   + on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="94-shared-services-kine"})
)

sum by (node) (
   sum by(pod) (go_sql_max_open_connections  ) 
   + on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="94-shared-services-kine"})
)
targets.legendFormat: max nb cnx for pod {{pod}} on node {{node}}

panels.title: kine sql active connections

panels.description:
go_sql_max_idle_closed_total The total number of connections closed due to SetMaxIdleConns.
go_sql_max_lifetime_closed_total The total number of connections closed due to SetConnMaxLifetime.

targets.expr: rate(go_sql_max_idle_closed_total [$__rate_interval])
rate(go_sql_max_idle_time_closed_total [$__rate_interval])

panels.title: kine sql closed connections per seconds

panels.description:
each dot represents a change in the kine_compact_total metric
The metric is updated by kine after the compaction ends, see source at https://github.com/k3s-io/kine/blob/c1da9bfb3f95dc329f7bacdd6f46b6c824d29ec2/pkg/logstructured/sqllog/sql.go#L168

targets.expr:
sum by (node) (
sum by(pod) (rate(kine_compact_total[$__rate_interval]))
* on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
  )

panels.title: compaction completion events per pod

targets.expr: sum by(pod, result) (rate(kine_compact_total{}[$__rate_interval])) * 3600

sum by (node,result) (
  sum by(pod, result) (rate(kine_compact_total{}[$__rate_interval])) * 3600
  * on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace"})
)

panels.title: rate of compactions per node and result

targets.expr:
sum by (node) (
   sum by(pod) (rate(kine_sql_total[$__rate_interval])) 
   + on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="94-shared-services-kine"})
)

panels.description: number of SQL operations. Individual pods are listed, potentially multiple ones on a same node

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (rate(kine_sql_total[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(pod) (rate(kine_sql_total[$__rate_interval])) 
+ on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="94-shared-services-kine"})

panels.title: kine sql queries per pod

panels.description: Length of time per SQL operation (in seconds, metric kine_sql_time_seconds  )

targets.expr:
sum by (pod) (rate(kine_sql_time_seconds_sum{error_code=""}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(kine_sql_time_seconds_count{error_code=""}[$__rate_interval]))
* on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="94-shared-services-kine"})

panels.title: Successfull kine requests latency by pod

options.content: Just a trick to insert a blank panel and align errors below

targets.expr: sum by(error_code) (rate(kine_sql_total{error_code!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Errored kine sql queries per error code

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (rate(kine_sql_total{error_code!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(node) (
   sum by(pod) (rate(kine_sql_total{error_code!=""}[$__rate_interval])) 
   * on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="94-shared-services-kine"})
)
targets.refId: sql queries joined with node name

panels.title: Errored kine sql queries per node

panels.description: Length of time per SQL operation (in seconds, metric kine_sql_time_seconds  )

targets.expr:
sum by (node) (
 sum by (pod) (rate(kine_sql_time_seconds_sum{error_code=""}[$__rate_interval]) / rate    (kine_sql_time_seconds_count        {error_code=""}[$__rate_interval]))
* on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="94-shared-services-kine"})
)

panels.title: Sucessfull kine requests latency by node

targets.expr: (sum by(error_code) (rate(kine_sql_time_seconds_sum[$__rate_interval]))) / (sum by(error_code) (rate(kine_sql_time_seconds_count[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: latency of kine sql queries per error code

panels.description:
# HELP go_goroutines Number of goroutines that currently exist.                                          
# TYPE go_goroutines gauge                                                                               
go_goroutines 29

targets.expr:
sum by (node) (
   sum by(pod) (go_goroutines) 
   + on(pod) group_left(node) sum by(pod,node) (kube_pod_info{namespace="94-shared-services-kine"})
)

panels.title: kine goroutines

panels.description: Length of time per SQL operation

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(kine_sql_time_seconds_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

panels.title: Kine requests latency per error

list.description: String to search for. Case sensitive. See external links for addiitional doc
list.label: logs contains string
list.name: query

list.description: Regexp to search for, ex: "(?i)failed" for matching FAILED or failed. By default the regexp is case sensitive. See additional doc links icons for further documentation.
list.label: logs contains a match to the regular expression
list.name: query_regexp
